title: Malicious Content
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
+ MALICEAFORETHOUGHT'S ARTWORK PAGE!
[[/=]]

Wow, look at this, a bunch of pieces of 'art' that past versions of myself thought were worthy of being uploaded to the internet. Thanks, previous me! --I'm not yet settled on a style, so join me on this journey through the wonderful world of medium-quality fanart...-- Style's an odd thing, eh? I'm certainly more consistent than I used to be, but I still vary in terms of perspective, medium, and... pretty much everything else. Medium-quality is still right, but hopefully I've settled on the right side of mediocre.

Suggestions are always welcome!

@@@@
[[div style="border-bottom:2px solid #777; margin-bottom:1px;"]]
[[/div]]
[[div style="border-bottom:1px solid #777;"]]
[[/div]]
@@@@

[[tab OLDER (BAD?) STUFF]]
